channel.title: Just an Idea
channel.description:
MY players are looking for a skilling minigame....
Any ideas?

item.title: Just an Idea
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Another one I just thought of is possibly making a contest for the first to a 200m experience in a skill.

Hmm single player…my second idea I had in the first post could be single player.

How about a single player “lair” minigame. Where you are trapped in this cavern with several doors and you have to fish etc to get the correct key to go to the next room.

Read full topic

item.title: Just an Idea

item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

I like both ideas!

But does anyone have any that could be maby like single player,and not need a team?

Read full topic

@Mill wrote:

Sounds maybe like competitive slayer tasks?

item.title: Just an Idea
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

A skiller contest.

Team 1 goes against team 2. The team with the most experience at the end wins.

Other idea is this

Two teams, each team has to complete a set of tasks before the other team. For example, fishing, cooking the fish, giving the fish to an npc receiving new task etc.

Read full topic
